name: VideoCustomizer
overview:
VideoCustomizer.com is a provider of interactive video marketing and video emailing services for organizations worldwide.

The companyâ€™s video email marketing platform is a feature-rich solution used by thousands of customers in countries across the globe, including many recognized brand names around the globe in retail, consumer and hospitality industries. With thousands of organizations using VideoCustomizer solutions to automate video email campaigns for events, announcements, sales and marketing needs, they now have the power to effectively reach customers with motion communication.
